title: Events
description: Event photography from music nights, festivals, and club openings across London and the UK. Capturing energy, atmosphere, and candid moments.

sections.title: The Mansion: Nightmare in Wonderland, London

images.alt: Saxophonist in sunglasses playing among costumed partygoers beside an ornate gold mirror
Partygoer holding up a playing card beneath a chandelier in a packed red-walled room
Costumed crowd dancing near giant red-and-white mushroom props and hanging flowers
Guest in a police vest costume posing through haze with mushroom decorations behind
Two friends in red military-style jackets and bow ties with playing card decorations hanging behind them
Person in a Chucky doll costume dancing on the crowded party floor
Woman in lace gloves dancing with arm raised beside oversized polka-dot mushroom props in hazy room
Four friends posing together in red jackets and formal wear with playing card suit decorations on the wall
Costumed guests gathered near dark paintings as a Chucky costume wearer interacts with the crowd
Group in Wonderland-themed costumes including a red top hat, ace of spades shirt, and bunny ears posing together
Five friends in costume makeup and formal wear huddled together holding playing cards
Three friends relaxing on a sofa beside a glowing red mushroom prop with striped shirts and face paint
Guests mingling under star-shaped mirror decorations and oversized playing cards on the wall
Packed crowd singing along in a red-lit room with an arched mirror and playing card wall art
Two women with Halloween face paint laughing and posing with arms up on the dance floor
Three friends in costume including a red military jacket and fake wound makeup posing arm-in-arm
Group of friends laughing and grabbing each other with fake blood makeup in a dark party room
Partygoers in costume near an ornate gold mirror in a deep red room with playing cards on the wall
Guest holding a cocktail and smiling at camera against red damask wallpaper and velvet curtains
Partygoers in bunny ears and costumes laughing in a tightly packed crowd with Halloween makeup
Black and white shot of a Union Jack flag waving in front of a massive industrial stage set with sweeping spotlights
Huge crowd facing an ornate castle-themed main stage at golden hour with dust rising in the sunlight
Night-time crowd before a grand illuminated stage with teal lights, pyrotechnics, and fire columns
Festival crowd in a woodland clearing with a flare held aloft casting orange light through the trees
Green and yellow lasers cutting across the night sky over a silhouetted crowd with LED screens on stage
DJ performing under purple lights in the pharmacy-themed Little Pharma stage with neon molecule graphics
Massive crowd before a palace-style stage with golden light beams streaming through haze at night
Festival crowd dancing beneath a geometric star-shaped stage structure in a sunlit forest clearing
Wide view of thousands gathered before the ornate main stage under dramatic overcast skies with flags waving
Reveller in a cowboy hat reaching toward the camera with blue stage lights illuminating the crowd behind
Close-up of the Winestock logo on a glossy black DJ booth reflecting the crowd at night
Guest in a velvet blazer holding a glass of wine with a tipi tent and festoon lights behind at dusk
Group of friends in elegant dresses and black tie holding drinks and chatting at golden hour
Performer in a blue feathered headdress and costume elevated above the crowd under festoon lights at night
Three friends in black tie laughing while riding a cargo bike across the festival lawn
Golden sunset casting long shadows over smartly dressed guests socialising between marquees on the lawn
Photographer shooting through a film camera with guests in formal wear and a dramatic sunset behind
Guests gathered on a dance floor under a stretch tent with the lit Winestock stage backdrop at dusk

sections.title: The Panther Club: Grand Opening, London

images.alt: Guest in a bow tie throwing rock-and-roll hand signs in a sepia-toned crowded club
DJ mixing on Pioneer decks with headphones around his neck while a woman watches from beside the booth
DJ in a patterned shirt with headphones adjusting the decks as guests in formalwear look on
Dimly lit cocktail bar with a glowing chandelier and silhouetted figures at the backlit counter
Two guests in velvet blazers chatting near the bar with bottles on illuminated shelves behind them
Four friends in smart evening wear posing together inside the dark club
Young DJ in a suit with headphones around his neck focused on Pioneer CDJs as a couple dances behind
Silhouette of a figure walking through a tunnel of illuminated arches at the club entrance
Couple holding a martini glass standing in a moody, dimly lit lounge with a chandelier reflected in the glass wall

sections.title: The Mansion: I love you to the Moon and back, London

images.alt: Packed dance floor beneath a crystal chandelier and laser beams in an ornate mansion ballroom
Partygoer in a Yoda mask with an open robe posing beside a smiling woman in black and white
Guitarist playing a Stratocaster on a leather sofa with paintings on the wall behind in black and white
DJ mixing on CDJs with hands raised from the crowd visible in dramatic backlight and haze
Ornate chandelier on a carved ceiling with a neon light tube trailing down in a grand mansion room
Guests lounging on sofas beneath large oil paintings and a neon light installation in a grand room
Young woman with arm raised dancing in a crowded red-walled room with a chandelier and ornate mirror above
Glowing mirror ball casting light through a dark room filled with chandeliers and red-purple haze
